definition: to grab/to catch/to arrest/to snatch/to scratch

sentences.english: The wildcat intruded into Chenggong's territory and was caught and killed by her.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，该野猫私闯了“成功”的领地，被抓捕并咬死。

sentences.english: Everybody knows that qadaffi was working with the US to route out terror suspects.
sentences.chinese: 大家都知道，卡扎菲和美国合作抓捕恐怖嫌疑人。

sentences.english: My job is to catch people who hunt and fish during the wrong seasons.
sentences.chinese: 我的工作是抓捕那些在错误的时间狩猎和捕鱼的人。

sentences.english: Miko:If I had not selected it, I would not have been chosen to hunt you down.
sentences.chinese: 如果我没有选过这项专长，就不会被选中来抓捕你们。

sentences.english: Check via the platoon, police was carried out independently to another suspect land capture.
sentences.chinese: 经排查，警方对另一嫌疑人陆自立实施了抓捕。

sentences.english: Police have charged a man with murder as a hate crime in her death.
sentences.chinese: 警方抓捕了一名男子，并以仇杀罪名将其归案。

sentences.english: The police have already arrested the bank robber.
sentences.chinese: 警察已经把银行抢劫犯抓捕归案。

sentences.english: The third chapter talked about application of criminal psychology in tracking down and arresting the criminal suspects.
sentences.chinese: 第三章论述了犯罪心理学在侦缉抓捕中的运用。

sentences.english: Over the past eleven years, Ken has eluded an international dragnet.
sentences.chinese: 在过去的十一年里，肯逃脱了国际抓捕网。

sentences.english: The capture of Mr. Mladic was a condition for Serbia to become a candidate to join the European Union.
sentences.chinese: 抓捕姆拉迪奇是塞尔维亚成为欧盟候选国的条件之一。

sentences.english: Immediately organized Bi blue clouds disguised as a woman with a child to catch.
sentences.chinese: 立刻组织毕晓云乔装成带孩子的妇女去抓捕。

sentences.english: A fourth pirate was captured in the operation on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 第四名海盗在周日的行动中被抓捕归案。

sentences.english: Salt goes on the run, using all her skills and years of experience as a covert operative to elude capture.
sentences.chinese: 绍特开始逃亡，动用所有技能和特工经验以躲避抓捕。

sentences.english: Dire Ravens in Blade's Edge Mountains now tameable.
sentences.chinese: 刀锋山的某种鸟现在可以抓捕。

sentences.english: Many described the department’s account of his capture and death as suspicious.
sentences.chinese: 许多人都质疑渔猎部抓捕并处死马乔的动机。

sentences.english: Arrest also means seize and hold under the authority of law.
sentences.chinese: 是指逮捕依法抓捕并拘留的意思。

definition: to fish by casting a net/to capture/to surround and seize
to pursue/to be after/to hunt down
to hunt and arrest (fugitives)/to track down and arrest/a manhunt
escaped criminal/fugitive from the law (criminal suspect on the run)
(of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
to deploy surveillance/to put under surveillance
to be at large (of a criminal)
